name: Digit Classifier API
description: FastAPI backend for digit classification with request queuing and rate limiting

APP_ALLOWED_ORIGINS.description: Comma-separated list of allowed origins for CORS

APP_ENABLE_AUGMENTATION.description: Whether to use augmentation for predictions

APP_DEBUG_MODE.description: Enable debug mode to save intermediate images

APP_MIN_CONTOUR_SIZE.description: Minimum size for contours in multi-digit detection

APP_MAX_REQUESTS_PER_MINUTE.description: Rate limit for API requests per IP

PROCESSING_CONCURRENCY.description: Maximum number of concurrent prediction tasks
